text: Bartolo Ambrosione (born 22 May 1959) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brescia
title: Bartolo Ambrosione
